column4: For some reason, Wine isn't opening exe files anymore.  I click on the exe, and it just sits there, I can hear it working (the hard drive) but it doesn't open the program.
For some reason, Wine isn't opening exe files anymore.  I click on the exe, and it just sits there, I can hear it working (the hard drive) but it doesn't open the program.  Any ideas?
what is this 'click' you speak of. open a term window, and run 'wine <path to>/<program>.exe'
yes It opens the wine process
